#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

#define rd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define rd2(x,y) scanf("%d %d",&x,&y)
#define rl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define rl2(x,y) scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y)
#define wd(x) printf("%d",x)
#define wd2(x,y) printf("%d %d",x,y)
#define wl(x,y) printf("%lld %lld",x,y)
#define PC() putchar()
#define GC() getchar()

#define F first
#define S second
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
#define D double

#define VI vector<int>
#define VL vector<long>
#define PII pair<int,int>
#define PLL pair<ll,ll>

#define E1(a) cerr<<#a<<":"<<a<<endl;
#define E2(a,b) cerr<<#a<<":"<<a<<" "<<#b<<":"<<b<<endl;
#define E3(a,b,c) cerr<<#a<<":"<<a<<" "<<#b<<":"<<b<<" "<<#c<<":"<<c<<endl;
#define E4(a,b,c,d) cerr<<#a<<":"<<a<<" "<<#b<<":"<<b<<" "<<#c<<":"<<c<<" "<<#d<<":"<<d<<endl;

#define maxr 75536
#define maxn 100009
#define P 472882049
#define mod 1000000007


int arr[maxn];
int s = 0;
int ans = 0;
int c = 0;
int main(){
	while(true){
		c++;
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		s = ans = 0;
		if(n==0)break;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){cin>>arr[i];s += arr[i];}
		s/=n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			if(arr[i]>s)ans += arr[i]-s;
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<c<<endl;
		cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<ans<<"."<<endl;
	}
}
